The documents suggest that Spinal Intradural Primary Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumors (MPNST) are not rare in neurofibromatosis patients. Document [8] also mentions that individuals with neurofibromatosis type 1 have a significantly increased risk of MPNSTs. Document [24] also states that MPNSTs are common in patients with neurofibromatosis type 1.
